GetStartedPage.title: Tīmata me Chester
GetStartedPage.introText: Nau mai ki Chester! Whāia ēnei hipanga hei tīmatanga mō tōu reo hōtaka hou.
GetStartedPage.step1Title: 1. Tāutahia te Proto hei whakahaere i ngā putanga o Chester
GetStartedPage.step1Description: Ko te Proto he taputapu hei āwhina i a koe ki te whakahaere i ngā putanga rerekē o Chester. Whakamahia ngā whakahau e whai ake nei i runga i tō punaha whakahaere hei tāuta i te Proto:
GetStartedPage.step2Title: 2. Whakamahia te Proto ki te tāuta i a Chester
GetStartedPage.step2Description: Whai muri i te tāutanga o te Proto, ka taea e koe te tāuta i a Chester mā te whakahaere i ngā whakahau e whai ake nei:

DownloadPage.title: Tikiake Chester
DownloadPage.introText: Tikiake Chester mō tō punaha whakahaere.
